author: bencomic

right.text: I hate men for the most part. It's not their fault and I shouldn't generalise like that, but I do. I was shot in the hip. Doctors fucked it up but I can still walk with a cane at least.

left.text: I was born in Lancaster, California. I've been turned down by more jobs than I can count, yet keep on trying.

right.text: I'm addicted to caffeine, nicotine, and working my way toward alcohol. I like addictive substances.

left.text: I'm polyamorous, though I absolutely hate the term and most of the people I've met that think of love the same way. Go figure.

right.text: At the end of the night, she ended up seeing the why. I spend more and more time at pubs now. The only social life I have offline.

left.text: I spent most of last night at the bar with a woman who, though beautiful and ironically far more drunk than she could handle, chided me for smoking, telling me I'm killing myself.

title: also, co hates co's parents for making co be male
